DOC.brief_summary: This study has 2 parts. Part 1 will evaluate the safety and IOP effects of 6 formulations of AGN-210961 ophthalmic solution in the study eye and bimatoprost ophthalmic solution 0.03% in the fellow eye for 7 consecutive days. Part 2 will evaluate the safety and IOP effects of a formulation (to be selected from part 1) of AGN-210961 in both eyes compared to bimatoprost ophthalmic solution 0.03% for 4 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of AGN-210961 Ophthalmic Solution Compared With Bimatoprost Ophthalmic Solution in Patients With Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Ocular hypertension or primary openangle glaucoma in each eye Any active ocular disease Anticipated wearing of contact lenses during study Anticipated use of artificial tears during study Contraindication to pupil dilatation
